Detailed Description

Structure to hold the texture information.

Field Documentation

void* data

Pointer to the texture data.

uint h

Texture height.

int handlex

Texture handle x.

int handley

Texture handle y.

uint nbtileh

Number of tiles for the y axis.

uint nbtilew

Number of tiles for the x axis.

int offsetx

Texture offset x.

int offsety

Texture offset y.

f32 ofnormaltexx

Offset of normalized texture on x.

f32 ofnormaltexy

Offset of normalized texture on y.

bool tiledtex

Texture is tiled if set to true.

uint tileh

Height of one tile.

uint tilestart

Offset to tile starting position.

uint tilew

Width of one tile.

uint w

Texture width.
